name: Adni
long_description:
Adni is the first all-in-one digital platform for healthcare workers to manage their careers. With Adni, healthcare workers can find jobs, buy gear, trade advice with peers, chat with career coaches, review education, store credentials, and earn rewards all in one AI-powered super app.

Leading healthcare organizations, such as UT Medical Center, Fusion Medical Staffing, CoreMedical Group, Uniti Med, PRN Healthcare, and Navi Nurses, partner with Adni to recruit, reward, and retain top-quality healthcare talent through our professional network and white-labeled talent experience software.
one_liner: The digital home for healthcare workers
